name: Holidays (itch)
description:
Video game designed as my final degree project for the Degree in Desing and Development of Video Games from the Jaime I University, Castellón.

It is a 2D game based on different mini-games divided in 4 chapters where you only have to use the mouse to play. The aim of this video game is to improve the cognitive abilites, attention and memory of children between 5 to 7 years.

Language: Spanish

Made with Unity. 

(2017)
